/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas.

In the distance, several tall power pylons rise against the sky, standing as silent sentinels amidst the city's hustle and bustle. The image is taken from the perspective of a car on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene, as if inviting the viewer to join in the journey through this vibrant city.
